General.Name: L&K Engineering Suzhou Co Ltd
General.Description: L&K Engineering (Suzhou) Co.,Ltd. provides cleanroom engineering services in China. The company also provides clean room construction planning, design suggestions, equipment configuration, clean room environment system integration engineering and maintenance services, etc. It serves in high-tech electronic industries, such as IC semiconductors, optoelectronics, and biomedicine, fine chemicals, aerospace, food manufacturing, and other related fields. The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Suzhou, China. L&K Engineering (Suzhou) Co.,Ltd. is a subsidiary of L&K Engineering Co., Ltd.
